name: Minimalist - Made in a week!
description:
Made in a week as part of our Level 5 Rapid Game Development module! Designed and developed by Gemma Pipe-Wolferstan, the game has a minimalist theme and contains puzzles whereby the player must move the levels themselves in order for the ball to reach the goal!

Browse our course page: https://www.uos.ac.uk/courses/ug/ba-hons-games-development
